item.description: tokens/FarmToken.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Dispersion Farm Token Based on the ERC-20 token standard. Emission is halved every year. ERC20 token with linear mining supply, rate changes every year. Events # Transfer sender : address, indexed receiver : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed Approval owner : address, indexed spender : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed CommitOwnership

tokens/StakableERC20.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Stakable ERC20 Token Based on the ERC-20 token standard as defined at https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20. USDN, WAVES for example. ERC20 stakable token Events # Transfer sender : address, indexed receiver : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed Approval owner : address, indexed spender : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed Deprecate account : address, indexed Reward

tokens/StrictTransfableToken.vy # vyper: 0.2.11 author: Dispersion Finance Team license: MIT Strict Transferable Token Based on the ERC-20 token that cannot be freely transferred https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-20. Transferable for white list only. ERC20 token Events # Transfer sender : address, indexed receiver : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed Approval owner : address, indexed spender : address, indexed value : uint256, notIndexed CommitOwnership
